ygData.subject: Re: Dex useless?
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think your information is complete. For one, in a very recent post one of the Verant guys (I forgot which one) said our fizzle rate (missed note I
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think your information is complete.

For one, in a very recent post one of the Verant guys (I forgot which
one) said our fizzle rate (missed note I assume) is based on dex and
CHA. Also most tests I have seen indicate Dex is a factor in your melee
ability. (With non-proc weapons). I have never done one of these tests
myself. If you have the time simply make two lvl 1 warriors. Only
fight 1 newbie mob (say bat or something). Give one all dex, give the
other all something useless like cha. Use the log thingy and see how
often both hit and their ave damage.
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
